_header: Hail God Ye shield Mother Holy King bear mild
_description: A salutation of the Virgin Mary — six long lines with medial rime

CamCCC405.First Lines:
Heyl god ye schilde modyr Holy kyng bere mildeHefne þat in
                    kepyng haȝ an world vit outyn hondyng…
CamCCC405.Last Lines:
…Als sune schene smyt your glas wer nis per senneWyt outyn
                    tene wemles kar child maydyn clene
CamCCC405.Editions:
Person,  Henry Axel. 
             Cambridge Middle English Lyrics.
         Seattle: University of Washington Press, 1953; rev. ed. 1962: 14.
